    • Method Detail

      • setParallelThreshold

        public void setParallelThreshold(int threshold)
        Set the threshold for breaking up CPU tasks for parallel execution. If a given task/op has length greater than the threshold, it will be broken down into a number of smaller tasks for execution.
        Parameters:
        threshold - New threshold to use for parallel execution

      • getParallelThreshold

        public int getParallelThreshold()
        Get the current threshold for parallel execution of tasks
